about_the_game:
ENGLISH:
Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots. It is necessary to shoot the robots several times to destroy them. The robots will shoot at us and try to stop us from achieving our goal. There are also missile launchers or explosive balls that will try to reach us. The game immerses us in endless explosions, and we must know how each robot behaves in order to eliminate them as efficiently as possible. We do not have a limit of shots, so we can create a hail of bullets.

The game has 4 stages (desert, night desert, jungle and night desert with fighter plane) and 5 difficulty levels, for a total of 20 stages. To pass to the next stage we must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots that can be destroyed (there is a type of robot that can not be destroyed). As the difficulty level increases we will have to get more gems and destroy more robots. In addition, other elements of the game will make passing the track more and more difficult.

In track 4 Cabezurrio will control a fighter plane that will shoot missiles and bombs. He will face several types of robots that will make things very difficult for us.

The jungle scenario contains animals that we cannot eliminate, so our mission will be to avoid them and collect the gems, which are contained in chests that we must shoot to open them.

At the beginning we can set the number of initial lives (10, 20, 30 or 40), being another way to choose the difficulty level.
The movement of the character is controlled by keyboard. We must choose key to move left, move right, jump/up, down, shoot, drop bombs and pause the game. If we are playing by pressing the pause button a menu will appear with which we can continue playing, return to the main menu or exit the game. If we press the pause button again the game will continue.

ESPAÑOL:
Juego de plataformas en el que controlamos a Cabezurrio, un soldado que debe recoger todas las gemas y destruir todos los robots a su paso en varios escenarios diferentes. Disponemos de un rifle con el que disparar a los robots. Es necesario disparar varias veces a los robots para destruirlos. Los robots nos dispararán e intentarán impedir que consigamos nuestro objetivo. También hay lanzamisiles o bolas explosivas que intentarán alcanzarnos. El juego nos sumerge en un sinfín de explosiones, y debemos saber cómo se comporta cada robot para eliminarlos de la forma más eficiente posible. No tenemos límite de disparos, por lo que podemos crear una lluvia de balas.

El juego tiene 4 escenarios (desierto, desierto nocturno, jungla y desierto nocturno con avión de combate) y 5 niveles de dificultad, para un total de 20 fases. Para pasar a la siguiente fase debemos recoger todas las gemas y destruir todos los robots que se puedan destruir (hay un tipo de robot que no se puede destruir). A medida que aumenta el nivel de dificultad tendremos que conseguir más gemas y destruir más robots. Además, otros elementos del juego harán que superar la pista sea cada vez más difícil.

En la pista 4 Cabezurrio controlará un avión de combate que disparará misiles y bombas. Se enfrentará a varios tipos de robots que nos pondrán las cosas muy difíciles.

El escenario de la jungla contiene animales que no podemos eliminar, por lo que nuestra misión será esquivarlos y recoger las gemas, que están contenidas en cofres a los que debemos disparar para abrirlos.

Al principio podemos establecer el número de vidas iniciales (10, 20, 30 o 40), siendo otra forma de elegir el nivel de dificultad.
El movimiento del personaje se controla por teclado. Debemos elegir la tecla para movernos a la izquierda, movernos a la derecha, saltar/arriba, abajo, disparar, lanzar bombas y pausar el juego. Si estamos jugando pulsando el botón de pausa aparecerá un menú con el que podremos seguir jugando, volver al menú principal o salir del juego. Si volvemos a pulsar el botón de pausa el juego continuará.

ENGLISH:
Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots. It is necessary to shoot the robots several times to destroy them. The robots will shoot at us and try to stop us from achieving our goal. There are also missile launchers or explosive balls that will try to reach us. The game immerses us in endless explosions, and we must know how each robot behaves in order to eliminate them as efficiently as possible. We do not have a limit of shots, so we can create a hail of bullets.

The game has 4 stages (desert, night desert, jungle and night desert with fighter plane) and 5 difficulty levels, for a total of 20 stages. To pass to the next stage we must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots that can be destroyed (there is a type of robot that can not be destroyed). As the difficulty level increases we will have to get more gems and destroy more robots. In addition, other elements of the game will make passing the track more and more difficult.

The jungle scenario contains animals that we cannot eliminate, so our mission will be to avoid them and collect the gems, which are contained in chests that we must shoot to open them.

The movement of the character is controlled by keyboard. We must choose key to move left, move right, jump/up, down, shoot, drop bombs and pause the game. If we are playing by pressing the pause button a menu will appear with which we can continue playing, return to the main menu or exit the game. If we press the pause button again the game will continue.

ESPAÑOL:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 185 MB available space

name: Cabezurrio vs Robots

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 91 MB available space

short_description: Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots and we will also be able to control a fighter plane.
